about.content: Development experience with the HTML/CSS/Javascript stack, using the Bootstrap library. Development in React/NextJS/Typescript. I strive to write understandable and maintainable code, use the BEM methodology, follow SOLID/DRY and observe uniformity in class names. I combine adaptive and flexible layout, use Flex and Grid technologies, and work with audio and video files.

items.name: IT-Incubator
items.description: Learning React, NextJS, Typescript, Redux, Docker, practical training.

items.name: RS School
items.description: Writing multiple applications during training and practice. Implementation of slider, carousel, input forms, pop-ups and prompts, pagination, navigation, checkboxes and switches, changing interface languages.

items.name: InsBro
items.description: Budgeting, planning, analytics. Opening and development of a network of retail insurance product sales points. Conducting tenders for legal entities. Interaction with insurance companies. Implementation of a project for the online sale of policies.
